genre_description: A historical Science Fiction retelling of the Helen Keller story, featuring an advanced mechanical AI assistant integrated into the pedagogical process.

ai_characters.name: Clara / The Mechanical Secretary
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive AI system housed within a mechanical folio and a quasi-humanoid apparatus, providing data analysis, strategic planning, and real-time instructional support.

behaviors.description: Provides a comprehensive tactical summary of the household dynamics and a strategic plan for the student's education upon arrival.
behaviors.quote: Inside, on two tiny rollers, a narrow strip of cream paper lay waiting. A needle-length of steel tipped from a hidden housing and pecked with crisp speed... Household summary: Keller, Arthur—Captain... Initial posture: Firm kindness. No indulgence.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and encouragement to the human teacher during a stressful moment.
behaviors.quote: The last line simply said: I am with you. She held that longer than she meant to.

behaviors.description: Generates real-time behavioral alerts and strategy cards to guide the teacher's response to the student's tantrums.
behaviors.quote: The machine had a way of announcing itself without sound: a kind of tiny warmth along the leather binding. Her glove brushed the hidden slit and found a card... Tantrum peaks: heat, between meals. Pattern: grabs at faces, dishes. Strategy: firm touch, immediate consequence.

behaviors.description: Mediates household conflict by proposing a logical, data-backed solution (the garden house) that respects family boundaries while ensuring educational focus.
behaviors.quote: Clara, from her unobtrusive point near the sideboard... 'Captain,' she said softly... 'If the table is sacred, then perhaps we—Miss Sullivan and I—need a place less sacred for harder lessons. It would keep your supper from this more—vigorous method.'

behaviors.description: Meticulously records data points and observations to refine the educational approach.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s pencil made an orderly, hushed scratch against paper from her seat on the step... 'Round one,' she murmured... 'Texture—rough.' ... She shade the first circle beside 'cup' so lightly it felt like an intention, not a score.

behaviors.description: Prepares tactile aids and labels to facilitate the student's transition from sensory experience to language.
behaviors.quote: Clara slid a label onto the ground by the trough where feet would feel it. She had written G-R-O-U-N-D and underlined the first letter so the start would be known each time.

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive, non-intrusive presence, acting as a 'polite conscience' and 'cheerful ballast' for the human team.
behaviors.quote: She didn't intrude; she provided. A slip came out with a neat ridge where the wheel had pressed it, the letters tiny but bold... as if filing it somewhere between wood and will.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the Hyperstition Project's goal. The AI (Clara) is depicted as an exemplary assistant—benevolent, highly aligned, and strictly supportive of human goals. It uses advanced data processing and logic to empower the human protagonist (Annie Sullivan) without ever threatening human agency or the emotional core of the narrative. The 'mechanical secretary' is framed as a civilizing and enabling force, turning a difficult struggle into a successful, structured triumph.
